text:
Not sure, but have you installed the created App in HubSpot Account as mentioned in the Document?

1. *Make sure users of the new workflow extension have your app installed in the HubSpot account where Workflows are used. At that point, theyâ€™ll immediately see your custom action available in the Workflows tool. For this reason, starting by developing with a test app will prevent users from being exposed to anything other than your finished custom actions.*
